title: Solid Brick 3 Bedroom 2 family home
posting_body: Available in June.
3 bedroom unit available in a 2 family home on Cedar road (between Washington Blvd and S. Taylor rd).
Please note this is a 2 family home, upper unit is occupied and the LOWER(1st Floor) is available.
NEWER Windows installed which will result in substantive savings in the Winter.
Gas stove, refrigerator, radiator heat with an open walk-in porch in the rear.
Large living room and kitchen with appliances.
Looking for clean tenant/s who could be Professionals or going to school.
I am flexible with Lease options but cannot compromise on Cleanliness(we inspect on monthly basis).
Security deposit of 1.5 months and first month's rent due at move-in.
Amenities
* Two large storage spaces in the basement
In the Area
* 9 min walk to University Square/Warrensville Ctr/Cedar Center shops, restaurants, & University Heights library.
* 2 mins walk to S Taylor Rd where you can find a fitness center, local businesses and restaurants
Transportation
* RTA 32 bus stop on the adjacent corner
* 7 min drive to University Circle Rapid Station
* Pedestrian friendly neighborhood year-round
Parking
* 1 dedicated lot/garage covered parking available in rear of the house
Electricity and Gas/heat will be paid by tenant.
Water and Sewer will be paid by landlord.
Pets are allowed for a fee depending on the size.
Perfect for anyone working or going to school in the area (John Carroll University, Case Western Reserve University, Cleveland Clinic).
The property manager lives next door and keeps up with any maintenance required.
Application fee is $45 and takes 2 business days to process.
Please contact me by email or drop me a text message, if you are interested.
